casebody.data:
BRAND ENERGY SERVICES, LLC, Indemnity Insurance Company of North America and Broadspire, Petitioners
v.
WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ARNAO), Respondent No. 565 EAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 29, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
